name: salaciousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of causing or showing a strong, often unpleasant interest in sexual matters: She was worried about the show's salaciousness. The only value in their story is in its salaciousness. See
salacious
More examplesFewer examplesthe outright salaciousness of many writersReality TV salaciousness is sure to be controversial.If you want salaciousness you should look elsewhere.
